bug.author: marente
bug.summary: 2 minor remarks: flashing when zapping through, saving keep-prev
bug.description: Hi I am currently using LabelMe to go through frames of videos and I wanted to mention that my eyes would love it if the old image would stay in place until the next video is loaded, at the moment I have a split second of grey background everytime I advance. It might be a hussle to make this change tho, so that wouldn't be worth it then. Bai

comments.comment: Also it would be useful if one had an additional option to not only autosave, but also autosave labels from --keep-prev - previous images, (except one deletes them.) At the moment I have to move every box a little.
